Germany: Council of Constance: An ecumenical council began which would condemn Jan Hus as a heretic, depose Antipopes John XXIII and Benedict XIII, and elect Pope Martin V.
India: Khizr Khan, deputized by Timur to be the governor of Multan takes over Delhi founding the Sayyid dynasty
Singapore: Temasek becomes part of the Sultanate of Malacca established by Parameswara.
Slovenia: The Habsburg Duke Ernest the Iron (1377–1424) thrones according to the ancient Karantanian ritual of installing dukes on the Duke's Stone and he addresses again as an archduke.
